summary: Fixed CSS 500 error in client portal by removing conflicting PostCSS config file. Client portal now using Vite's Tailwind CSS plugin instead of PostCSS. CSS loading successfully and client service running on port 5001.
current_status: All three subdomains operational with same template: /app (5000), /admin (5002), /client (5001). Client portal migration complete from Next.js to Vite + React + TanStack Router. CSS compilation working correctly.
